title.native: Nicky Larson et le parfum de Cupidon

synopsis.native: Nicky Larson est le meilleur des gardes du corps, un détective privé hors-pair. Il est appelé pour une mission à hauts risques : récupérer le parfum de Cupidon, un parfum qui rendrait irrésistible celui qui l’utilise...
synopsis.english: After having saved a child in Babysitting 1, caused chaos in Brazil in Babysitting 2 and made plausible the unthinkable in Alibi.com, Philippe Lacheau is back to save the world, well, at least part of it! Based on the world-famous Japanese manga City Hunter, Ryo Saeba (Philippe Lacheau) is THE private detective you go to to resolve the most complex cases. His one weakness: women! In this action-packed comedy, Ryo Saeba drags us through one crazy adventure after another. His first mission: to get his hands on the Cupid’s Perfume, a perfume that makes whoever sprays it become irresistible...
